hero.heroSubtitle: We create spaces you want to live in. Experience, quality, and punctuality are our guarantee.
hero.title: Professional renovations and finishing
hero.description: We create spaces where you want to live. Experience, quality, and timeliness – that's our guarantee.

services.sectionSubtitle: Comprehensive renovation solutions tailored to your needs
services.remontyMieszkanDesc: Comprehensive apartment renovations - from demolition to finishing. We design and implement layout changes.
services.wykonczeniaDesc: Painting, tiling, flooring, suspended ceilings - every detail perfected.
services.praceMurarskieDesc: Partition walls, plastering, demolition, structural modifications - solid foundations for every renovation.
services.lazienkiKuchnieDesc: We specialize in comprehensive bathroom and kitchen renovations - installations, fittings, furniture.
services.instalacjeDesc: Professional electrical installations and modernizations in apartments and houses.
services.projektowanieDesc: We create functional and modern interior designs according to your style.

projects.sectionSubtitle: Gallery of completed projects - see our portfolio

whyUs.sectionSubtitle: What sets us apart from the competition

values.title: 15 years of experience
values.description: Hundreds of completed projects and satisfied clients. Our knowledge is a guarantee of the highest quality.

values.title: Punctuality
values.description: We respect your time. We set realistic deadlines and consistently meet them.

values.title: Quality guarantee
values.description: We provide a warranty for all works performed. Your satisfaction is our priority.

values.title: Competitive prices
values.description: We offer the best value for money. Transparent cost estimates without hidden fees.

values.title: Professional team
values.description: Our specialists are masters of their craft – qualified, experienced, and committed.

values.title: Comprehensive service
values.description: From design to cleaning after renovation – everything in one place. Full service at every stage.

reviews.sectionSubtitle: Clients trusted us – see what they say about our work!

reviews.name: Anna K.
reviews.text: Great company – full professionalism, punctuality, and excellent contact. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Michał W.
reviews.text: Apartment renovation done perfectly, everything according to plan.

reviews.name: Karolina P.
reviews.text: Professional service, quick contact, and great advice at every stage.

footer.description: Professional renovations and interior finishing. 15 years of experience in the construction industry.
